code.dws.dbConnectivity

Class DBConnection

  • java.lang.Object
    • code.dws.dbConnectivity.DBConnection

  • public class DBConnection
extends java.lang.Object
    Basic DB functionality class. On top of this DBWrapper runs as a wrapper.
    Author:
    Arnab Dutta
